comment.text: This translation key is used for a label that indicates whether to show feedback and support features. It will be displayed as a checkbox label in a UI component, likely on a settings page or similar interface where user preferences are managed.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Rəy və Dəstək keçidini göstərin" literally translates to "Show the Feedback & Support link". While not entirely wrong, a more natural phrasing would be something like "Rəy və Dəstək" or "Geri bildirim və Dəstək". The imperative "göstərin" (show) is not ideal for a link label.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rəy və Dəstək

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Показване на линк за обратна връзка и поддръжка' is a literal translation that sounds awkward in Bulgarian. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Връзка за обратна връзка и поддръжка'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Връзка за обратна връзка и поддръжка

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Zobrazit odkaz Zpětná vazba a podpora" uses "odkaz" (link) which is redundant as 'Zpětná vazba a podpora' implies a link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zpětná vazba a podpora

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Link zum Feedback & Support anzeigen" literally translates to "Show link to feedback & support". While understandable, it's not the most natural way to express the original English phrase "Show Feedback & Support link" in German. A better phrasing would focus on displaying the link itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link zu Feedback & Support

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation includes quotes around "Ανατροφοδότηση και υποστήριξη". These are not present in the English source and do not seem necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the quotes: Εμφάνιση του συνδέσμου Ανατροφοδότηση και υποστήριξη

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Feedback y Soporte' is a more literal translation. A more natural Spanish phrasing would be 'Comentarios y Soporte' or 'Ayuda y Comentarios'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Mostrar enlace a Comentarios y Soporte' or 'Mostrar enlace a Ayuda y Comentarios'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The ampersand (&) in the English content is represented as an ampersand in the Finnish translation. While acceptable, it's more common and visually cleaner to use 'ja' (and) in Finnish in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Näytä Palaute ja Tukilinkki

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Feedback & Support' is directly translated. A more natural French phrasing would consider a more idiomatic equivalent. 'Feedback' doesn't translate directly and is often used as is in French in this context, but a more accurate rendering of 'Support' would be 'Assistance'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Afficher le lien Feedback et Assistance

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Mostra il link a Feedback e assistenza' is a literal translation but not the most natural phrasing in Italian. 'Feedback e assistenza' is acceptable, but 'Feedback e supporto' would be a more direct and commonly used translation of 'Feedback & Support'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mostra il link a Feedback e supporto

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "フィードバック＆サポートのリンクを表示する" literally translates to "Display the Feedback & Support link." While technically correct, it's less natural and concise in Japanese. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the presence of the link, rather than the action of displaying it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: フィードバック＆サポートへのリンクを表示

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "&" in the Japanese translation mirrors the English. While acceptable, using a full-width space or a hyphen might appear more polished in Japanese contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: フィードバック＆サポートへのリンクを表示

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The ampersand (&) in the English content "Feedback & Support" is directly translated as a Korean ampersand. While technically correct, it might be more natural to use '및' or '와/과' for a more flowing Korean sentence. However, retaining the '&' is acceptable in a UI context as it mirrors the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using '및', '와', or '과' instead of '&' depending on the desired formality and context. However, retaining '&' is perfectly acceptable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ສະ​ແດງ​ໃຫ້​ເຫັນ​ຄໍາ​ຄິດ​ເຫັນ​ແລະ​ການ​ເຊື່ອມ​ຕໍ່​ສະ​ຫນັບ​ສະ​ຫນູນ​' is a very literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Lao. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'ສະ​ແດງ​ການ​ສະ​ຫນັບ​ສະ​ຫນູນ​ແລະ​ຄໍາ​ເຫັນ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສະ​ແດງ​ການ​ສະ​ຫນັບ​ສະ​ຫນູນ​ແລະ​ຄໍາ​ເຫັນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation 'Feedback & Ondersteuning link weergeven' is a literal translation of 'Show Feedback & Support link' but doesn't convey the same meaning in natural Dutch. The 'weergeven' (display) is unnecessary and makes the phrase clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Feedback & Ondersteuning

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pokaż link do Opinii i wsparcia' is not a direct or natural translation of "Show Feedback & Support link". While 'Opinii i wsparcia' covers 'Feedback & Support', 'Pokaż link do' is somewhat clunky. A more natural translation would be something like 'Link do Opinii i wsparcia' or 'Pokaż sekcję Opinii i wsparcia'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link do Opinii i wsparcia

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Mostrar a hiperligação de Feedback e Apoio' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Portuguese. 'Feedback' and 'Support' are often kept in English in Portuguese contexts, or translated with more common equivalents.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Mostrar link de Feedback e Suporte' or 'Mostrar link de Avaliação e Suporte'. The most natural choice will depend on the overall tone and style of the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Afişare linkul de feedback şi asistenţă' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Show Feedback & Support link'. 'Afişare' (display) is a bit clunky in this context. A more natural translation would emphasize the presence of the link rather than its display.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link Feedback și Asistență

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'şi' instead of '&' is grammatically correct but might not be consistent with the original English. Maintaining the '&' could be a stylistic choice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link Feedback & Asistență

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ හා සහාය සබැඳිය පෙන්වන්න' literally translates to 'Show Feedback & Support link'. While understandable, it's a bit clunky and not the most natural way to express the concept in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ හා සහාය' (Feedback & Support) or 'ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ හා සහාය ලබා ගන්න' (Get Feedback & Support). The verb 'පෙන්වන්න' (show) is unnecessary and doesn't quite fit the context of a link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ හා සහාය' or 'ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ හා සහාය ලබා ගන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Zobraziť odkaz na spätnú väzbu a podporu" is a very literal translation. A more natural Slovak phrasing would be something like "Odkaz na spätnú väzbu a podporu" or "Zobraziť spätnú väzbu a podporu". The addition of 'odkaz' feels a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odkaz na spätnú väzbu a podporu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Feedback & Support' is not accurately translated. 'Povratne informacije i podrška' is a more accurate rendering of 'Feedback and Support'. 'Прикажи линк' (Show link) is appropriate, but the core meaning of 'Feedback & Support' is slightly off.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Прикажи линк Повратне информације и Подршка

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of lowercase 'подршка' is inconsistent with the capitalization in the English source. Capitalizing 'Podrška' would be more consistent and common in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Прикажи линк Повратне информације и Подршка

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Prikaži link Povratne informacije i podrška' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Serbian.  'Feedback & Support' is commonly translated to 'Povratne informacije i pomoć' or 'Povratne informacije i podrška' but the phrase 'Prikaži link' is awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link Povratne informacije i podrška

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation includes a space before 'Povratne' which is not standard Serbian punctuation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link Povratne informacije i podrška

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Geri Bildirim ve Destek bağlantısını göster" literally translates to "Show Feedback & Support link". While technically correct, it's less natural in Turkish. A more idiomatic phrasing would be 'Geri bildirim ve destek' or 'Geri bildirim ve destek için'. The word 'göstermek' (to show) is not commonly used in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Geri bildirim ve destek

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Показати посилання на зворотний зв’язок та підтримку' is a literal translation. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky and formal for a UI label. A more natural and concise translation would be better suited.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise option like 'Зворотний зв'язок та підтримка' or 'Підтримка та зворотний зв'язок'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Shfaqni lidhjen e opinionit dhe mbështetjes' is not a direct or accurate translation of 'Show Feedback & Support link'. 'Opinion' doesn't accurately convey 'Feedback'. A better translation would reflect the meaning of 'Feedback and Support'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Shfaq lidhjen për komente dhe mbështetje
